item.title: Uh-Oh: Account Level Security and Advanced Search
item.description: I’m continually surprised that even with a decade of training experience, Dynamics GP users still uncover unexpected features. Just recently, during a class, a situation arose concerning account level security and the advanced search within the account lookup window. For those unfamiliar with account level security, sometimes called organizational structures, this Dynamics GP feature allows you to organize users and general ledger accounts according to your company’s structure. This limits which accounts each user can access.

item.title: Why is it important to consider User Classes?
item.description: In recent Dynamics GP versions, security roles, tasks, and operations have become the preferred way to manage user security, replacing the older user class model. This shift leads many to question the continued relevance of user classes in Dynamics GP. Microsoft Dynamics GP-Tools-Setup-System-User Classes Users are assigned to a class in Setup-System-Users Despite this shift, user classes still offer several advantages within Dynamics GP. Let’s explore some of these benefits.
